Lines Extended Demo
===================

.. |pic12| image:: /images/examples/canvas__lines_extended__py.png
   :width: 50%
   :align: middle

|pic12|

This demonstrates how to use the extended line drawing routines such as
circles, ellipses, and rectangles. You should see a static image of labelled
shapes on the screen.


.. _`canvas_lines_extended.py`:

File **canvas/lines_extended.py**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

.. include:: ../../../examples/canvas/lines_extended.py
    :code:
